original_text: So Joshua did as Moses had said to him, and fought with Amalek: and Moses, Aaron, and Hur went up to the top of the hill.
korean_text: 여호수아가 모세의 말대로 행하여 아말렉과 싸우고 모세와 아론과 훌은 산 꼭대기에 올라가서

sentences.original_text: So Joshua did as Moses had said to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 여호수아는 모세가 자신에게 말한 대로 했다

sentences.original_text: and Moses, Aaron, and Hur went up
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모세, 아론, 및 훌은 올라갔다

sentences.original_text: to the top of the hill
